page_content: The page provides comprehensive advice on health protection at the workplace, including ergonomics and hazardous materials.
The page provides tax forms and guidelines for natural persons in the Canton of Basel-Stadt.
The page offers a CD-ROM guide that provides comprehensive information on the disposal of medical waste.
The page offers a poster and guidelines on earthquake preparedness, specifically targeting students.
The page provides best-practice examples for noise reduction measures at construction sites.
The page outlines the initial steps to be taken in the event of a death, including notifying medical professionals and arranging for burial.
The page provides updates and announcements from the Bettingen Citizens' Council, including upcoming elections and community activities.
